typical_applications: General purpose freight and retail distribution
characteristics_nl: Standard 53-foot dry van trailer for general freight, most common equipment type, suitable for palletized goods and retail merchandise, no temperature control
Shorter 48-foot dry van, good for regional routes and urban delivery, standard freight capacity without temperature control
Short pup trailer for city deliveries and LTL operations, easier maneuverability in urban environments, no climate control
Full-length refrigerated trailer with multi-temperature zones, suitable for frozen and fresh products, continuous temperature monitoring, pharmaceutical grade available
Mid-length reefer for regional distribution, multi-temp capabilities, ideal for mixed temperature loads requiring fresh and frozen zones
Short refrigerated trailer for urban deliveries, single temperature zone, good for restaurant and grocery store deliveries
Standard flatbed for construction materials and machinery, open deck allows top and side loading, requires tarping for weather protection
Long flatbed for oversized loads and construction equipment, maximum flexibility for loading, tarping required for weather-sensitive cargo

specialized_features: Lower deck height|Upper and lower decks
characteristics_nl: Step deck with lower main deck for taller loads, upper deck provides additional space, ideal for equipment exceeding standard height

specialized_features: Lower deck height|Upper and lower decks
characteristics_nl: Extended step deck for maximum capacity and height clearance, two-level deck system, specialized for oversize machinery
Ultra-low deck height for extremely tall and heavy equipment, detachable gooseneck for easy loading, specialized for construction machinery
Curtain-side trailer with rolling tarp system, allows side loading and unloading, combines benefits of flatbed and dry van
Mid-length curtainside for regional operations, rolling tarps provide weather protection with side access flexibility
Stainless steel liquid tanker for food-grade and chemical products, insulated options available, clean-in-place capable for sanitation
Heavy-duty chemical tanker for corrosive and hazardous materials, DOT hazmat certified, temperature control for viscous products
Pneumatic bulk trailer for powdered materials, air pressure discharge system, ideal for cement, flour, and plastic pellets
Agricultural hopper trailer for grain and bulk products, gravity discharge through bottom gates, roll tarp for weather protection
Multi-level car carrier for automotive transport, hydraulic deck adjustment, specialized vehicle securement, typically carries 8-10 vehicles
Tractor without trailer for pulling customer-owned or pre-positioned trailers, standard fifth wheel coupling

specialized_features: Extra low center section|Heavy duty|Wide load
characteristics_nl: Ultra-low center deck section for maximum height clearance, raised sections at front and rear, specialized for tall heavy equipment
Dry van equipped with hydraulic liftgate for locations without loading dock, ideal for residential and retail deliveries
Refrigerated trailer with liftgate for cold chain delivery to non-dock locations, combines temperature control with ground-level access
Gooseneck trailer for pickup truck towing, expedited service for urgent small loads, faster turnaround than full truckload
Standard 20-foot ISO shipping container, intermodal capable for ship/rail/truck, stackable, import/export freight
Standard 40-foot ISO container, most common international shipping size, intermodal rail and truck compatible
High-cube 40-foot container with extra foot of height, ideal for lightweight voluminous cargo, intermodal compatible
Refrigerated ISO container with integral cooling unit, intermodal rail/truck/ship compatible, international cold chain logistics
Multi-deck livestock trailer with ventilation and animal welfare features, washable interior, specialized for live animal transport
European-style curtainside with full side opening, metric dimensions, commonly used for European imports requiring side access
Dry van with removable roof panels for top loading of tall items, combines weather protection with loading flexibility
Insulated dry van without active refrigeration, protects cargo from temperature extremes, ideal for temperature-sensitive non-perishable goods
